rows.label: qst201813_msg0001
rows.name: Pepe, where could you be...?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0002
rows.name:
Hello? You look so sad.
Did something happen?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0003
rows.name: Huh?! You can understand me, Mimi?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0004
rows.name: Yes! I can.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0005
rows.name:
...You do seem different
from other people.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0006
rows.name: You seem more like one of us!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0007
rows.name:
Um, if something is troubling you,
I, Uka, will be happy to listen.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0008
rows.name:
...Well, Mimi has a childhood
friend named Pepe.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0009
rows.name:
But he left a while ago
and hasn't come back yet.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0010
rows.name:
He doesn't seem to be in
this village, but Mimi can't
go out to look for him...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm worried he might have gotten
into an accident somewhere.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0012
rows.name: I see! Uka will handle it!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0013
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0014
rows.name: Yes, leave it to me!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0015
rows.name: Uka has a good idea of what happened.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0016
rows.name:
Pepe-san must have been taken
away by the people of Superbia!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0017
rows.name: Is that so?!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0018
rows.name:
Yes, I'm sure of it! Putting such
a strange device on a Divine Beast...
they must be a rotten bunch!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0039
rows.name: Uka will definitely rescue him!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0019
rows.name:
But I haven't seen any people from
Superbia, so maybe it's not them?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0020
rows.name: No, it's definitely them!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0021
rows.name:
Poor thing... Pepe-san must be
shivering with fear right now!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0022
rows.name: Mimi-san, please wait here!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0023
rows.name: U-Um... then I'll be counting on you.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0024
rows.name:
But searching blindly
will take too much time.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0025
rows.name:
If only there was someone
who knew something...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0026
rows.name:
Then you should go to
the Phonex settlement.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0027
rows.name:
Pepe might have stopped by
there at some point...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0028
rows.name: A Phonex settlement?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes, it's in Yeshiva Harbor.
Mimi and Pepe are from there!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0030
rows.name: Could you guide us there?

rows.label: qst201813_msg0031
rows.name:
I'd like to guide you,
but... that's a bit...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0032
rows.name:
There are really scary
monsters that appear on
the way to the settlement.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0033
rows.name: I was attacked by one once...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0034
rows.name:
Since then, I've been scared and
have been staying in this village.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0035
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201813_msg0036
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst201813_msg0037
rows.name:
It's in Yeshiva Harbor, right?
We'll go meet them ourselves!

rows.label: qst201813_msg0038
rows.name: I'm sorry... Please take care of Pepe.
